alert.note: Alert for Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument; Pine Ridge, Nebraska National Forest (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 10 at 3:10PM CDT until April 11 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT TUESDAY AFTERNOON FROM NOON TO 6 PM... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES AND ABOVE AVERAGE TEMPERATURES... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect Tuesday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 434 through 436. * WIND...West to southwest winds 15 to 25 MPH with gusts up to 30 MPH. * HUMIDITY...Minimum 10 to 15 percent Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte, South Sioux, Niobrara River; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument; Pine Ridge, Nebraska National Forest
